text:
Jof Davies built an advanced LinkedIn-to-WordPress automation system using Zapier, Webhooks, Google Sheets, Formatter, and ChatGPT.

Capabilities include:
- Scraping LinkedIn post URLs from Phantombuster into Google Sheets.
- Cleaning, validating, and filtering content for automation.
- Using Webhooks to extract post data including body text and media.
- Passing content to ChatGPT to produce full editorial-style articles.
- Posting both the image and the rewritten article to WordPress.
- Updating spreadsheets with status and metadata.
- Using fallback logic for failed rewrites and republished posts.

This automation replaced an entire manual editorial workflow and produced consistent, formatted site-ready content with minimal human input.
